channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbusinessAndMarkets
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbusinessAndMarkets, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Vibe Coding Just Minted Another $100 Million-Revenue Company in Record Time
item.description: Lovable recently became a unicorn, too. Its breakneck growth demonstrates the enthusiasm for a very promising application of AI.

item.title: To Find Your Life Purpose Ask Yourself This 1 Weird Question

item.title: Why the Fed will likely keep interest rates unchanged at its upcoming meeting

item.title: Mira Murati’s record-breaking $2 billion seed round made the impossible possible for female founders
item.description: The former OpenAI CTO is now running Thinking Machines Lab—with $2 billion in her war chest.

item.title: The U.S. and European Union announce a joint deal on tariffs

item.title: A Family Dollar store’s roof collapsed and killed a 68-year-old man two days after someone reported the building ‘slowly tilting’
item.description: Three people were also injured by the partial collapse of the building.

item.title: When will my Rite Aid store close? List of pharmacy closure dates amid ongoing prescription transfers

item.title: IPOs are hot again. How investors can avoid a 2021 style hangover
item.description: The public offerings of one-time darlings like Rivian and Roblox offer a cautionary tale.

item.title: Samsung’s chip business just scored its biggest deal from a single customer ever, courtesy of Elon Musk
item.description: Tesla is up 0.2%, and Samsung's stock in South Korea jumped 6.8%, as U.S. stocks hover near record highs.

item.title: Workers in Boeing’s defense division are preparing to strike. Here’s why

item.title: How to Find and Use Force Multipliers at Work
item.description: Hiring more people doesn’t always improve performance. Look for people who will help everyone around them do better.

item.title: This Strategy ‘Nearly Killed’ Zocdoc. How the $1.8 Billion Business Became Profitable

item.title: Realistic Deepfakes Pose a Serious Threat to U.S. Businesses
item.description: Creating deepfakes is getting easier than ever. Fighting back may take even more AI.

item.title: Paul Dans, Project 2025’s chief architect, says the U.S. Senate is ‘the headwaters of the swamp’
item.description: Dans plans to challenge Sen. Lindsey Graham in South Carolina, adding "it's time to show him the door."
